Package hotelproject.controllers.db

Class BookingsDB

java.lang.Object
hotelproject.controllers.db.BookingsDB
public class BookingsDB
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used for manipulating all the SQL operations related to bookings.

    • BookingsDB

      public BookingsDB​(java.sql.Connection conn)

  • Method Details

    • findAllBookings

      public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> findAllBookings()
      Search all current available rooms and return as ArrayList.
      Returns:
      list filled with all Room objects collected from the database.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking​(Booking booking)
      Inserts new row into the `booking` table in the database.
      Parameters:
      booking - Booking object that will be added to the database

    • getBookingsForSpecificDay

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getBookingsForSpecificDay​(java.lang.String date)
      Search the related booking ids by specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - Date string from front-end will be used for checking in database.
      Returns:
      All booking ids that meet the conditions will be saved in ArrayList.

    • getBookingDetails

      public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getBookingDetails​(int b_id)
      Retrieve booking information from database and save it in a hashtable.
      Parameters:
      b_id - Booking id is used for checking detail information in the database.
      Returns:
      Hashtable's keys are table's attributes and value is the related information.

    • updateBooking

      public void updateBooking​(Booking updatedBooking)
      Update a booking to the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedBooking - the new booking is encapsulated in this object

    • deleteBooking

      public void deleteBooking​(Booking booking)
      Delete the booking from database.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking object for delete.
